com.android.mailcommon

Interface MergedAdapter.ListSpinnerAdapter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MultiAdapterSpinner.FancySpinnerAdapter
    Enclosing class:
    MergedAdapter<T extends MergedAdapter.ListSpinnerAdapter>

    public static interface MergedAdapter.ListSpinnerAdapter
extends android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
    A Mergeable adapter must implement both ListAdapter and SpinnerAdapter to be useful in lists and spinners.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface android.widget.Adapter

        IGNORE_ITEM_VIEW_TYPE, NO_SELECTION

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface android.widget.ListAdapter

        areAllItemsEnabled, isEnabled

      • Methods inherited from interface android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

        getDropDownView

      • Methods inherited from interface android.widget.Adapter

        getCount, getItem, getItemId, getItemViewType, getView, getViewTypeCount, hasStableIds, isEmpty, registerDataSetObserver, unregisterDataSetObserver
